Description:
Required skills to be successful:3-5 years in After Sales & Services in Compressors, 3Dryers, Winches, BOP Hoists & Tools / Equivalent Automotive products
Good knowledge and experience in compressed air system equipment’s, Centrifugal Compressors, Oil Free Compressors is expected
Good product knowledge on Ingersoll Rand oil free and Centrifugal Compressors & presentation skills About the team:Working in a fast-paced and diverse environment. Reporting directly to the Service Manager. What equips you for the role:Bachelor Degree /Diploma in Science / Mechanical / Electrical Engineering
3-5 years’ experience in After Sales & Services of compressed air system equipment’s / compressed air system projectsJob Details
